description:
Say goodbye to knuckle pain while cleaning your cassette. The angled brush head keeps your hand away from the spinning cassette, making cleaning a breeze.

  • Gets into those tight spaces on your chain, cassette and chainrings
  • A lower center with stiffer bristles provides a channel for the chain
  • Softer and longer outer bristles for thorough chain-side cleaning
name: Peaty's Drivetrain Brush
